terrassen.title: DRIVEWAY AND TERRACE
terrassen.subtitle: Laying a terrace or driveway?
terrassen.text: Devalbo from Londerzeel builds beautiful terraces for you in a style that matches your home or property. The choice is entirely yours. For example, we use platines, cobblestones with a flattened top, perfect for homes in a pastoral style and available in brown, gray, black, and multicolored. Prefer a modern style? Then klinkers or tiles might be better suited. Various materials are possible, such as natural stone or concrete klinkers. Terrace construction Constructing a terrace requires specific expertise. At Devalbo, this knowledge has been passed down from father to son. The most important aspect of terrace construction is preventing subsidence. You can rest assured if you entrust your terrace to us. We ensure a level and perfectly aligned installation. Free advice We advise you based on your budget regarding possibilities, materials, maintenance, and durability. You choose the materials, and we deliver and install your terrace.
terrassen.contact_text: Are you convinced of our craftsmanship and would you like to request a quote? Be sure to contact Devalbo!

verbouwingen.title: Devalbo is the ideal partner for your complete renovation in Londerzeel and far beyond.
verbouwingen.text: With extensive experience in renovation work, we offer high-quality service to our clients. We work alone, ensuring a personal and dedicated approach to every project.
verbouwingen.renovation_text: At Devalbo, we understand better than anyone that a complete renovation is a major undertaking. That's why we offer a thorough and structured approach to transform your home. Whether you want to install a new kitchen or renovate your living room, we have the expertise to make your dream a reality. Note that for electrical work, we refer you to specialized partners.
verbouwingen.bathroom_text: A bathroom is more than just a functional space; it’s also a place to relax and unwind. At Devalbo, we ensure a stylish and practical bathroom renovation that meets all your needs.
verbouwingen.attic_text: Need extra space? An attic renovation can completely transform your home. Whether it’s creating a new bedroom, office space, or playroom, Devalbo can help you make optimal use of every square meter.
